message.content:
cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.HC. 

The paper addresses the problem of modeling and forecasting long-term goals of a first-person camera wearer using first-person visual observations. This involves reasoning about semantic states and future goal states, which suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and computer vision (cs.CV). The use of online inverse reinforcement learning also suggests a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and robotics (cs.RO). Finally, the application of this work to understanding human behavior and daily activities suggests a focus on human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
